Control Name: SEC 1.3 Identify and validate control objectives
Control Statement: Based on your compliance requirements and risks identiﬁed from your threat model, derive and validate the control objectives and controls that you need to apply to your workload. Ongoing validation of control objectives and controls help you measure the eﬀectiveness of risk mitigation.

control_attributes.Control: SEC 1.3 Identify and validate control objectives
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you securely operate your workload?
